title: Balanced Diet Basics
description: Learn the core principles of a balanced diet, including portion sizes and food groups.

title: Understanding Macronutrients
description: Explore proteins, carbohydrates, and fats, and how they contribute to daily energy needs.

title: Hydration and Health
description: Discover why water is essential and how much you should drink each day.

title: Healthy Snacking Tips
description: Ideas for nutrient-rich snacks that keep you full and energized between meals.

title: Vitamins and Minerals
description: An introduction to essential micronutrients and the foods that provide them.
